name: NSFileAccessIntent
desc: The details of a coordinated-read or coordinated-write operation.

items.name: class func readingIntent(with: URL, options: NSFileCoordinator.ReadingOptions) -> Self
items.desc: Returns a file access intent object for reading the given URL with the provided options.

items.name: class func writingIntent(with: URL, options: NSFileCoordinator.WritingOptions) -> Self
items.desc: Returns a file access intent object for writing to the given URL with the provided options.

items.name: var url: URL
items.desc: The current URL for the item managed by the file access intent instance. (read-only)
